#!/bin/sh -f
qsub -I -N Interactive -l select=1:ncpus=12:mpiprocs=12 -l walltime=01:00:00 -q regular -A P48500028


module purge
export JEDI_OPT=/glade/work/jedipara/cheyenne/opt/modules
module use $JEDI_OPT/modulefiles/core
module load jedi/gnu-openmpi
module load atlas/ecmwf-0.29.0
module load emacs

## Pointing wrfhydropy to a specific version Sep-2020
## First Install the wrfhydropy package from Sep-2020 to a target folder
## pip install --target=/glade/work/mazrooei/wrfhydropy/pip-wrfhydropy-git wrfhydropy@git+https://github.com/NCAR/wrf_hydro_py.git@22eb7c827f5219ce5911e0607ce6c054e665fd4b
## Then add /path/to/install/bin to PATH and /path/to/install to PYTHONPATH
PATH=$PATH:/glade/work/mazrooei/wrfhydropy/pip-wrfhydropy-git/bin
PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/glade/work/mazrooei/wrfhydropy/pip-wrfhydropy-git

python3.7 ./jedi_workflowpy.py jedi_workflow_LETKFOI_SWE.yaml
